subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Maybe there is only one box user allowed!?
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
--_fbae09eb-ce31-4824-864d-65004b5ebb64_
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable


 I think maybe we beat Mr. Moon up enough. He did get the box out there in=
 the world, and has done some good with it. I think lets focus on our own w=
ork, and let the evidence play out as it will. 
 
 I support all mthods, an=
d think they all work, my boxes, the Mini Box, The Radio hacks, anything th=
at provides ths raw audio the entities can use, they will use. They use wha=
t we use, they have no limits. It's impossible for me to support, or endors=
e just one product, or reseacher. I just started the box thing, I don't thi=
nk what I do  should be the end all of it, or the final word. Let the evide=
nce speak for it's self. 
 
 Frank-S
 


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: o=
rbhunterx@...: Tue, 4 Dec 2007 05:49:17 +0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] R=
e: Maybe there is only one box user allowed!?




Exactamundo, Ann! Nothing=
s stopping us that are activily involved investigating haunted locations. W=
here EVP has to an extent proven a haunting, going back to the location to =
use a Box is worth a college try. I can hardly wait... If it does work, hel=
ping earth bound spirits to discuss their predicament, and eventually cross=
over, would be a win win win situation!Lance --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com=
, Lisby <lisby@...> wrote:>> I have to opine that we really have no idea ye=
t whether that is all > true or not. Only time will tell and only the if a =
wide variety of > researchers use the equipment under varying circumstances=
.> > Ann> > On Dec 3, 2007, at 8:49 PM, bruce halliday wrote:> > > Frank,> =
>> > After doing box research for a while now and having the opportunity > =
> to work with several different> > types of boxes. I would have to agree t=
he boxes are meant for and > > work better as a stationary communication de=
vice> > sort of like a communication station that is consistently under the=
 > > same basic conditions. I have never taken my boxes out of my home> > o=
r done a session out side of my home and I don't believe that > > taking th=
e box , any box not just yours to a remote allegedly > > haunted location> =
> will not serve to enhance communication. And if anyone is really > > conc=
erned about summoning dark entities they have a much better chance> > of th=
at communicating with a grounded and maybe disgruntled or > > confused enti=
ty at a haunted location.> >> > so I agree with your assessment of box use =
100%> >> > Bruce> >> >> >> > Bruce Halliday> > Paranormal Investigating Tea=
m> >> >> >> > To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com; hauntedtimes@...> > From: franks=
-boxes@...> > Date: Mon, 3 Dec 2007 14:43:43 -0700> > Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC=
] Re: Maybe there is only one box user allowed!?> >> > This 'negativity' is=
 bad enough, I wouldn't even want it on the > > group except Moon is the on=
e that says everyone else, me and the > > group included, gets only 'false =
communcation' or 'bad guys', and > > that's from his own friggin' blog, I d=
idn't make that up, or pull > > it out of my butt. So it effects us all, an=
d I think is open for > > discussion/comment knowing this will get forwarde=
d back to him. In > > fact I'll cc Moon this posting.> >> > When he says al=
l these scan radio users, that means me to, since I > > use the things, and=
 I prefer the linear scan mode. What I say about > > the box use is complet=
ely disregarded, and what I get through the > > box, myself, as The Box Mak=
er, is minimalized by Moon. Moon puts my > > name out there connected with =
his so called 'telephone to the > > dead', and I very much disapprove of my=
 name being applied to an > > unauthorized use of my equipment. I don't giv=
e a crap what he gets > > through the boxes, or does with it, but don't mak=
e it look like I > > designed it specificaly as the 'telephone to the dead'=
, I designed > > it as a friggin' ITC device, that is capable of two way > =
> communication--SOMETIMES, it's not like it's a guarenteed > > connection,=
 and you can't just dial up anyone, anytime, that's an > > exageration! The=
 "box" was intended by me to be used in a fixed > > location, just by takin=
g it to a GHU, or an "investiigation" is > > using it in a way I did not in=
tend, and I still say it's better if > > used in one place. All guide lines=
 I have offered for box use are > > completely ignored, not just by Moon, t=
o be fair.> >> >> > It has been shown that many different approaches work f=
or this > > communcation, I suggest Moon design and build his own 'telephon=
e > > the dead' and leave my name out of it.> >> >> > Frank-S> >> >> >> > C=
onnect and share in new ways with Windows Live. Connect now!> >> >> >> > Yo=
ur smile counts. The more smiles you share, the more we donate. > > Join in=
!> >> >>

 I think maybe we beat Mr. Moon up enough. He di=
d get the box out there in the world, and has done some good with it. =
I think lets focus on our own work, and let the evidence play out as i=
t will. <BR>
 <BR>
 I support all mthods, and think they all work=
, my boxes, the Mini Box, The Radio hacks, anything that provides ths raw a=
udio the entities can use, they will use. They use what we use, they have n=
o limits. It's impossible for me to support, or endorse just one product, o=
r reseacher. I just started the box thing, I don't think what I d=
o  should be the end all of it, or the final word. Let the evidence sp=
eak for it's self. <BR>
 <BR>
 Frank-S<BR>
